Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for the segment starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending at SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 measured as the duration until the next distinct activity in the trace
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer No Response in traces where no agreement follows
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Declined when decline occurs after the reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants involving reassignment after the second reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the interval between its occurrence and the subsequent completion of reviewer assignment (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in multi-round invitation variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in end-to-end review paths that include this reminder
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late in delayed-reviewer-selection variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late'

Name: Average duration from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to final editorial decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, or SW-EIC Major Revision) in traces containing the reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and Assign a Different Editor in variants where editor reassignment follows the second reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'
